title: Holy Office Familiar
common: List of individuals accepted as Holy Office Familiars for having "clean blood", or rejected due to their ancestors' non-Christian origins.
This special section was created because these investigations examined multiple generations of the candidates.

value.name: Pedro Dias Paes (Leme)
value.desc: was accepted as a Familiar after an extensive investigation that traced five generations of his family. During the Paulista Civil War, three generations of his family were defamed as Jewish, but witnesses and documents proved that there were no known Jewish ancestors in his lineage.

value.name: Garcia Roiz Paes Leme
value.desc: underwent a simpler investigation, as an uncle and a cousin had previously been accepted as Familiars.
